name: Dr. Sarah Chen
bio: Environmental engineer with 15 years of experience in sustainable energy systems. Passionate about building inclusive communities through clean technology.

name: Marcus Thompson
bio: Community organizer focused on grassroots environmental action. Electrical engineering student at University of Calgary.

name: Amara Okafor
bio: Former teacher bringing innovative environmental curriculum to schools across Alberta. Committed to youth empowerment.

name: James Running Bear
bio: Blackfoot Nation member working to integrate traditional ecological knowledge with modern sustainability practices.

name: Elena Rodriguez
bio: Fundraising professional with a track record of securing grants for environmental and social impact organizations.

name: David Park
bio: Software developer and renewable energy enthusiast. Building digital tools for community engagement and impact measurement.
